statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data;
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_speed FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE vehicle_speed > 60;
SELECT MAX(traffic_volume) AS max_traffic_volume FROM traffic_flow_data;
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM traffic_flow_data GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_speed FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE vehicle_speed > 60 ORDER BY vehicle_speed DESC;
SELECT timestamp, vehicle_type, vehicle_speed FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 AND road_section_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(vehicle_speed) AS average_speed, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE road_section_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type, COUNT(DISTINCT road_section_id) AS unique_sections FROM traffic_flow_data GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT road_section_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT road_name, road_type FROM road_infrastructure WHERE traffic_volume < 1000;
SELECT vehicle_type, speed, time FROM traffic_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT road_name, traffic_volume FROM road_infrastructure WHERE road_type = 'Highway' ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING AVG(speed) > 60;
SELECT road_id, road_name, traffic_volume FROM road_infrastructure WHERE traffic_volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data INNER JOIN road_infrastructure ON traffic_data.id = road_infrastructure.road_id;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_type, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY speed DESC
SELECT road_name, segment_length, traffic_flow FROM RoadSegments WHERE congestion_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM InfrastructurePlan WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY implementation_date
SELECT plan_description, location FROM InfrastructurePlan
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT id, date, speed, average_speed FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' ORDER BY speed DESC
SELECT segment_id, road_name, segment_length FROM RoadSegments WHERE traffic_flow > 1000 ORDER BY segment_length ASC
SELECT * FROM InfrastructurePlan WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY implementation_date DESC
SELECT plan_id, location, plan_description FROM InfrastructurePlan ORDER BY plan_id
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData;
SELECT road_id, date, average_speed FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT road_name, road_length FROM RoadInfrastructure ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT construction_id, start_date, end_date, contractor_name FROM RoadConstruction WHERE contractor_name LIKE '%Construction%';
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE average_speed > 60 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT road_name, road_length FROM RoadInfrastructure WHERE road_length > 10 ORDER BY road_length ASC;
SELECT AVG(traffic_volume) AS avg_volume, incident_type FROM TrafficFlowData JOIN TrafficIncidents ON TrafficFlowData.road_id = TrafficIncidents.road_id GROUP BY incident_type;

SELECT TrafficFlowData.flow_id, RoadConstruction.contractor_name FROM TrafficFlowData JOIN RoadConstruction ON TrafficFlowData.road_id = RoadConstruction.road_id WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData;
SELECT road_id, flow_rate FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE flow_rate > 100;
SELECT road_name, road_type FROM RoadInfo ORDER BY road_name DESC;
SELECT signal_type, signal_status FROM TrafficSignals WHERE road_id = 5;
SELECT accident_id, accident_type, accident_date FROM RoadAccidents WHERE accident_type = 'Collision';
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE flow_rate > 100 ORDER BY traffic_date DESC;
SELECT road_name, road_type, construction_year FROM RoadInfo WHERE construction_year < 2000;
SELECT road_id, signal_type, signal_status FROM TrafficSignals WHERE signal_status = 'green' ORDER BY road_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RoadAccidents WHERE accident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT road_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM RoadMaintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
